name: Bikini Armour Explorers
description:
Bikini Armor Explorers is an RPG game developed by Kiralice Sha and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

Pienetta, a weapon store's daughter in a remote country, is fascinated by adventure because of an old map.
Fate seemed to see through her mind. Under the influence of some emergencies, Pienetta embarked on an adventure with her three companions.

FEATURES

  • Classic J-RPG
  • Beautiful graphics
  • Mini games
  • Multiple endings
